3DES

https://csrc.nist.gov/CSRC/media/Projects/Cryptographic-Standards-and-Guidelines/documents/examples/TDES_OFB.pdf
Szyfrowanie:
plaintext: 6BC1BEE22E409F96 = 0110101111000001101111101110001000101110010000001001111110010110
Iv: F69F2445DF4F9B17 = 1111011010011111001001000100010111011111010011111001101100010111
key1: 0000000100100011010001010110011110001001101010111100110111101111 = 0123456789ABCDEF
key2: 0010001101000101011001111000100110101011110011011110111100000001 = 23456789ABCDEF01
key3: 0100010101100111100010011010101111001101111011110000000100100011 = 456789ABCDEF0123
ofb_enrycpt(plaintext, key1, key2, key3, Iv) = 078bb74e59ce7ed6
011110001011101101110100111001011001110011100111111011010110 = 078bb74e59ce7ed6

Deszyfrowanie:
ciphertext: 078bb74e59ce7ed6 = 011110001011101101110100111001011001110011100111111011010110
Iv: F69F2445DF4F9B17 = 1111011010011111001001000100010111011111010011111001101100010111
key1: 0000000100100011010001010110011110001001101010111100110111101111 = 0123456789ABCDEF
key2: 0010001101000101011001111000100110101011110011011110111100000001 = 23456789ABCDEF01
key3: 0100010101100111100010011010101111001101111011110000000100100011 = 456789ABCDEF0123
ofb_decrypt(ciphertext, key1, key2, key3, Iv) = 6BC1BEE22E409F96
0110101111000001101111101110001000101110010000001001111110010110 = 6BC1BEE22E409F96
